basics.name: Carissa Hicks
basics.label: Data Analyst
basics.summary: I am a recent Master of Science in Data Analytics graduate from the University of Illinois - Springfield.

courses: Computer Programming Concepts I and II

work.summary: Play a vital role in understanding customer interactions and sales performance.
highlights: Analyze video footage and accurately record data in Excel.
Perform quality checks on recorded data to ensure consistency and reliability. Identify and resolve any discrepancies or data anomalies.
Data entry of patient satisfaction surveys and financial revenue
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Collaborate with supervisors and co-counselors to determine the best resources and help for texters
Ability to multitask by handling multiple conversations

certificates.title: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
certificates.summary: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner with a strong understanding of cloud computing fundamentals, AWS services, and cost-effective cloud management. Committed to implementing secure and scalable cloud solutions while staying up-to-date with AWS innovations to drive project success.
